name: Russian Roullete 1962 ⋆
description:
"je ne regrette rien"

Vienna 1962,
Vlad Azarovich, a K.G.B agent, finds himself playing russian roullete against Michelle Reza, an SDECE agent.

Azarovich met Reza in France 10 years before their encounter in Vienna, speaking fluent french he managed to get very close to Michelle, she was a target of the soviet union, not just any target, she was the daughter of Colonel Reza, a french colonel who got wrangled with the soviet union many years ago.
